name: Pro-Tec Athletics RM Extreme Mini Portable Contoured Roller
categories: RM Extreme Mini Portable Contoured Roller
description: Depump after a redpoint burn or an endurance training session. This little roller packs easily into your crag bag and helps relieve tight or pumped forearms (and other body parts too).Contoured EVA roller wraps around body parts and is easy to clean.Handle end offers single point myofascial release.
